body:
Summoners Rift
5vs5
2 Elimination
Tournament Draft 
7:30 PM CEST

****Admin words are absolute***** 

Players Must respect the tournament that they shouldn't start normal the games while they are waiting for their games. the team that miss their game will be instantly Disqualified , repeating it will lead to perm ban them from joining any further tournaments we are hosting. 

1) Each team has 10 min pause you must warn the op ( abusing the pause system will lead to warning , if a team keep abusing it , the guilty team will be Disqualified).

2) Game must start 10min (15min for first round ) from the moment the code appears for both teams , Guilty team will be Disqualified. 

3) The player can't join more than 1 team.

4) For the top 4 teams who are qualified to play the finals if a team surrendered or did not attend, the FULL team will be considered out of the tournament and they will not be eligible to win any of our prizes.

5) Special Case : When a team has "BYE" and their opponents have match . Then Round 2 will starts at 1 hour from the time the tournament starts. (if the opponents teams 1 of them had been Disqualified ) then the 2 teams will have to contact each other to play their game or they will have to wait the 1 hour to pass.

6) Team must Check the roaster of their opponents to make sure that the players joining the game are the same registered in the tournament .

7) All teams must make sure that they checked their roaster before joining the game . they can contact the admins to add any new players Before *** Semi-finals**** . after that they must use the players registered in the roaster or they will be Disqualified. 

8) Rules For Free Agents Teams Only:

-If a member leave the team of the free agents before the*** semi-finals*** , the rest of the team can invite any other player to join the team .(you will have to send the team name and player name to the admin to add him to the team )

9) Only 1 of the team member contact the admin if they have any problem , several members contacting the admin will lead to Warning , repeating it will lead to Disqualifying the guilty team.

------) Last but not least , enjoy the game and remember that you are playing for fun and don't forget that you are humans ^_^ . 

1- Each team must have at least 5 players or more.

2- The game will not be repeated under any conditions. (only in case of both sides accept to rematch the game will

be re-maked).

3- Players that insult their opponents are going to receive first warning , repeating it will lead the guilty team to be Disqualified.

4- Behave in a respectable manner toward tournament officials.

5- Prizes will take 2-14 days to be delivered to your account.

6- If you don't have 16 champions you will get disqualify you and your team.

7- The team on Higher seed have the 1st pick (seed 1 higher then seed 2) unless both of the teams agreed on something else .

8- Place holder not allowed in this tournament.
